english.segment1: Let the Earth rejoice. See the risen King. On the clouds of praise. He's exalted forever
english.segment2: We will rise with Him. Son of righteousness. And the Earth will shake. In the glory of heaven
english.segment3: Chorus: See the heavens open wide. And His glory like a flood. Fill the earth with salvation. See the nations take His hand. And in righteousness, they stand. This is Jesus generation
english.segment5: Chorus. Glory, glory, glory, Emmanuel, God is with us (till the end)
